newsitem.title: USA: Lexington Corporate Q4 shr $0.06 vs $0.11.
newsitem.headline: Lexington Corporate Q4 shr $0.06 vs $0.11.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Full Name is Lexington corporate properties Inc
NOTE: Q4 1996 funds from operation per share were $0.34 vs $0.33 in Q4 1995.

Q4 1996 included $0.07/shr charge from non-recurring expenses relating to a proposed equity offering which was abandoned and expenses incurred in connection with portfolio acquisitions which were proposed but not completed.
